Package lu.uni.distributedsystems.gsonrmi.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Interceptor
    Server-side request interceptor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseServer
    Base class for a JSON-RPC server.
    IPEndpoint
    An IPEndpoint represents a combination of IP address and port number.
    RpcConnectionHandler
    A handler for a single JSON-RPC server connection.
    RpcSocketListener
    A listener for JSON-RPC server connection requests.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServiceMode
    Enumeration of the modes in which JSON-RPC requests shall be processed.
